summary.para: The GetCapabilitiesKey method gets a registry key that contains capability information for the codec.

param.name: pHKey
param.para: Receives a handle to the registry key. The caller must close the handle by calling RegCloseKey.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: There is no capabilities key for this codec.

remarks.para: To enumerate the values for the returned key, call RegEnumValue.

summary.para: The IGetCapabilitiesKey interface enables an application to retrieve the capabilities of a software or hardware codec from the registry, without creating an instance of the encoder filter. The moniker for the codec filter exposes this interface. For more information, see Encoder API.
